General.Name: Kisco Holdings
General.Description: KISCO Holdings Corp., through its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and sells steel products primarily in South Korea. It offers reinforcing bars, wire ropes, strands, and harbor loading and unloading products; and hard drawn steel wires. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

0.Name: Se-Hong  Chang
0.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Chief Director
